subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Todd Heap, a two-time Pro Bowl tight end, was placed on injured reserve by the Ravens on Saturday. Plagued by a nagging hamstring injury, Heap played in only six games, recording 23 catches for 239 yards and a touchdown.
snippet: Todd Heap, a two-time Pro Bowl tight end, was placed on injured reserve by the Ravens on Saturday. Plagued by a nagging hamstring injury, Heap played in only six games, recording 23 catches for 239 yards and a touchdown.
